Escrow.EscrowState","name":"","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalInitialDeposits","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"withdraw","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"MagRelo","custom:security":"This contract uses OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard for security","details":"Generic escrow contract for managing deposits and payouts  This contract implements a flexible escrow system where: - Participants deposit a fixed amount of tokens - An oracle determines the final payouts based on results - Payouts are distributed according to basis points (10000 = 100%) - Oracle receives a fee for their services  Key Features: - Fixed deposit amounts per participant - Oracle-controlled payout distribution - Automatic fee collection for oracle - Expiry-based refund mechanism - Cancellation support - Gas-optimized participant management ","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"EscrowDeposited(address)":{"params":{"participant":"The address of the participant who deposited"}},"EscrowWithdrawn(address)":{"params":{"participant":"The address of the participant who withdrew"}},"ExpiredEscrowWithdraw(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount withdrawn","participant":"The address of the participant who withdrew"}},"PayoutsDistributed(uint256[])":{"params":{"payouts":"Array of payout amounts distributed to participants"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"cancelAndRefund()":{"details":"Only callable by the icense":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c13d13304ac79a83ab1c30168967d19e2203342ebbd6a9bbce4db7550522dcbf","dweb:/ipfs/QmeN5jKMN2vw5bhacr6tkg78afbTTZUeaacNHqjWt4Ew1r"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x982c5cb790ab941d1e04f807120a71709d4c313ba0bfc16006447ffbd27fbbd5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8150ceb4ac947e8a442b2a9c017e01e880b2be2dd958f1fa9bc405f4c5a86508","dweb:/ipfs/QmbcBmFX66AY6Kbhnd5gx7zpkgqnUafo43XnmayAM7zVdB"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x11a5a79827df29e915a12740caf62fe21ebe27c08c9ae3e09abe9ee3ba3866d3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3cf0c69ab827e3251db9ee6a50647d62c90ba580a4d7bbff21f2bea39e7b2f4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZiKwtKU1SBX4RGfQtY7PZfiapbbu6SZ9vizGQD9UHjRA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x79796192ec90263f21b464d5bc90b777a525971d3de8232be80d9c4f9fb353b8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f6fda447a62815e8064f47eff0dd1cf58d9207ad69b5d32280f8d7ed1d1e4621","dweb:/ipfs/QmfDRc7pxfaXB2Dh9np5Uf29Na3pQ7tafRS684wd3GLjVL"]},"src/Escrow.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc9e36cff961d0306487922483a4b29a025d4f3255ef27a0b0d91b1351a2010a3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d9990e08f338e74fefc43ad9c281c970d1a8ecf33ad90de6fe301fe3d926b197","dweb:/ipfs/QmUhz5MhDhiDw9CsFNTbemWinh7ZDQKNU3S5oXcMowM8Cp"]}},"version":1}

cancelAndRefund().details: Only callable by the oracle in emergency situations  This function: - Refunds all participants their full deposit balance - Clears all participant tracking - Moves escrow to CANCELLED state  Requirements: - Caller must be the oracle - Escrow must be in OPEN or IN_PROGRESS state  Emits an {EscrowCancelled} event

closeDeposits().details: Only callable by the oracle when the escrow is ready to proceed  Requirements: - Caller must be the oracle - Escrow must be in OPEN state  Emits a {DepositsClosed} event

constructor.details: Validates all parameters and sets up the escrow

params._decimals: The number of decimal places for the payment token
params._depositAmount: The amount each participant must deposit
params._expiry: The timestamp when the escrow expires
params._oracle: The address of the oracle that controls the escrow
params._oracleFee: The oracle fee in basis points (max 10000 = 100%)  Requirements: - _depositAmount must be greater than 0 - _expiry must be in the future - _paymentToken must not be the zero address - _oracle must not be the zero address - _oracleFee must not exceed 10000 (100%)
params._paymentToken: The address of the payment token contract

deposit().details: Transfers tokens from participant to escrow and tracks participationSame address can deposit multiple times, increasing their balance  Requirements: - Escrow must be in OPEN state - Escrow must not be at maximum unique participants - Participant must have approved sufficient token allowance  Emits an {EscrowDeposited} event

params._addresses: Array of addresses to receive payouts
params._payoutBasisPoints: Array of basis points for each address (10000 = 100%)  This function: - Calculates oracle fee from total deposits - Distributes remaining funds according to basis points to specified addresses - Transfers any remaining dust amounts to oracle  Requirements: - Caller must be the oracle - Escrow must be in IN_PROGRESS state - _addresses and _payoutBasisPoints arrays must have same length - Total basis points must equal 10000 (100%) - Addresses must not be zero address  Emits a {PayoutsDistributed} event

expiredEscrowWithdraw().details: Can be called by any participant after the expiry timestampIf balance reaches zero, removes participant from tracking  Requirements: - Participant must have a non-zero balance - Current timestamp must be after expiry  Emits an {ExpiredEscrowWithdraw} event

returns._0: The number of unique addresses that have deposited

withdraw().details: Refunds the deposit amount and updates balance trackingIf balance reaches zero, removes participant from tracking  Requirements: - Escrow must be in OPEN state - Participant must have a non-zero balance  Emits an {EscrowWithdrawn} event

MAX_PARTICIPANTS().notice: Maximum number of participants allowed (gas optimization for distribute function)

cancelAndRefund().notice: Cancels the escrow and refunds all participants

closeDeposits().notice: Closes deposits and moves escrow to IN_PROGRESS state

constructor.notice: Constructor initializes the escrow with configuration parameters

deposit().notice: Allows a participant to deposit the required amount into the escrow

depositBalance(address).notice: Mapping to track total deposit balance per address

distribute(address[],uint256[]).notice: Distributes payouts to participants by address

expiredEscrowWithdraw().notice: Allows participants to withdraw one deposit amount after escrow expiry

getParticipantsCount().notice: Gets the current number of unique participants in the escrow

oracle().notice: Address of the oracle that controls payouts and escrow state

participants(uint256).notice: Array of unique participant addresses (for cancelAndRefund)

paymentToken().notice: The payment token used for deposits and payouts

paymentTokenDecimals().notice: Decimal places of the payment token

totalInitialDeposits().notice: Total amount of initial deposits collected

withdraw().notice: Allows a participant to withdraw one deposit amount before the escrow proceeds
